programme.title: Family Feud

programme.title: Class Of 3000 S1
programme.desc: When Li'l D finds out that Sunny will have to spend his Saturday relaxing at a teacher's retreat instead of tackling his weekend To-Do List Li'l D proposes that he and the Westley kids do Sunny's chores in exchange for the use of Sunny's state-of-the-art home studio. But when Li'l D throws away Sunny's How To Do the To Do List the kids soon find that getting things done just might do them in.

programme.title: Class Of 3000 S1
programme.desc: When Philly Phil starts feeling like an outcast at Westley because of his poor performance in a Field Day event he transfers to a science magnet school. Missing their friend and feeling guilty for their role in making him feel unwanted the Westley kids have their work cut out for him when they try to woo him back. Meanwhile Luna is tired of being constantly upstaged by Sunny and vows to make the school think he's just as cool.

programme.title: Class Of 3000 S1
programme.desc: Adventures with music superstar Sunny Bridges and his class.

programme.title: Class Of 3000 S1
programme.desc: When Li'l D inadvertently offends the participants in the annual Five Points Renaissance Fair the Rennies lay siege to Westley and destroy the school's auditorium. With nowhere to stage their musical production of Rapunzel (in which Eddie will play the lead) the kids ask Eddie to convince his parents to pay for the repairs. However upon hearing about the dangerous way in which the auditorium was destroyed Eddie's parents become unreasonably overprotective of their son to the point where Eddie must decide between quitting the musical or standing up to his parents.

programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by host Dwayne Johnson. programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: <Dear X> follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: 10 X 10

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Experience Namibia’s wild 1,000km coast! Where arid deserts meet stubborn life, this film captures a grandiose, fragile spectacle of nature thriving against all odds. Witness the impossible beauty!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Step back in time! Explore Queensland’s ancient wetlands and primary rainforests. Home to survivors of prehistoric eras, it’s a vibrant journey to the very origins of tropical Australia.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Small country, massive impact! Costa Rica hosts 5% of all Earth's species. Trek from peaks to shores to see why protecting this rich, living sanctuary is an absolute necessity for our planet.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Meet the new wild warrior volunteers, as they are introduced to Imire’s extended animal family. Getting dirty is part of the job. And of course, there are always striking surprises at any moment.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala. The intelligence of these anti poaching elephants astounds everyone. And, there is always time for fun tasks.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Volunteers explore the community’s role in conservation, with thrilling honey harvesting, a new addition to the team, and a dream come true as one feeds a black rhino.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The poaching crisis intensifies and poachers turn their attention to orphanages. After losing her mother, four-week-old Jamila finally finds sanctuary at The Rhino Orphanage.

programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony is convinced that Layla is deep undercover and tries to talk to her alone to get through to her. Meanwhile, the crew investigates the gang’s production of the mysterious formula from the tattoo. When Frostee discovers that the product of the formula is unstable and will explode, Tony has to save Layla, who is driving a whole truck of it!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As our team floats in a boat to England, they are on their last legs. Po tells a story explaining the customs and traditions of Chinese New Year to elevate their spirits.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: The gang breaks into Stricklers office for clues to Killahead Bridge but ends up releasing a monster into school and Strickler reveals his true form.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jims Trollhunting life and his high school life collide when Claire becomes a target for Goblin revenge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh reveal how they invented sock dawgs to avoid war between humans and Boov; When Bobe and Guppa come to babysit, Tip and Oh have a crazy fun time with them, until Tip has to be the adult

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: After Lucy goes on another bad date, Tip and Oh set on a mission to find her a guy; When Oh to shows Elrod around a waterpark, everything goes wrong

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: On a search for Dagur's dad, Hiccup and Dagur encounter vicious Grim Gnashers, and Tuff's search for a missing Chicken leads him to discover she has a second family

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Our team battles Rafaela’s mind-controlled crowd. They soon discover that Rafaela’s true plan is to steal the spy plane. Tony deduces that Rafaela isn’t doing all of this for the money - she’s doing it for family.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Cleve Kelso breaks Rafaela Moreno and a dangerous, cybernetic prisoner named Matsuo Mori from a high-security ice prison. Back in LA, Tony and the crew experience a major shake-up when Echo gets accepted to Ms. Nowhere’s spy training but Tony is rejected. While Tony is grappling with his identity crisis, Echo struggles to survive spy school, and Ms. Nowhere and Gary disappear in a massive North African storm during their hunt for Cleve. Echo must lead the Toretto crew and finish Ms. Nowhere’s mission – what could Cleve be up to in the desert?

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The team travels to Nihaya, or “The Dead End,” in their pursuit of Nowhere’s mission. Unfortunately they run into some of Layla’s spurned former criminal partner Sandocal, who steals the kids’ cars for revenge on Layla. With Frostee, Cisco, and Echo held captive, Tony and Layla drive for Sandocal in a dune buggy race to win back their crew’s freedom. The crew manages to steal a few of the dune buggies and take off into the desert! Meanwhile, Rafaela and Matsuo bust into a secret military base and steal an important piece of tech for Cleve.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As our team floats in a boat to England, they are on their last legs. Po tells a story explaining the customs and traditions of Chinese New Year to elevate their spirits.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling “Adult Babies” before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.desc: Our team battles Rafaela’s mind-controlled crowd. They soon discover that Rafaela’s true plan is to steal the spy plane. Tony deduces that Rafaela isn’t doing all of this for the money - she’s doing it for family.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jims quest for Gunmars birthstone sends the gang deep into the heart of a volcano that is not what it seems and Strickler seeks to protect himself.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: After the events at Gattos Keep Blinky is transformed into a human being and Jim discovers the assassin that is hunting him.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: While Jim and Toby search for dates to the Spring Dance the team searches for the Second Triumbric Stone in the marshlands of the Quagawumps.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged
programme.desc: The Trux meet an exotic multitool Xee who uses her resourceful ways to help Revvit ClickClack and Waldo get back home and in the process learn the value of having friends

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: In the wake of her grandfather's death, Lucky sets out to show the town his softer side and give him the goodbye he deserves.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: As the Paladins inch closer to Earth, alarming revelations of the planet's condition are exposed

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: There's no such thing as the perfect, simple gift for the members of the Pod 4. The kids over-think and over-plan their holiday gift giving until they've driven themselves — and each other — a little crazy.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: When distracted spotter Birch turns away for a minute, Sandra falls and ends up twisting her ankle. Feeling immensely guilty, Birch offers her assistance, which Sandra promptly begins to take advantage. Suspecting she's being exploited, Birch sets Sandra up for a “big fall” in front of the whole school at a poetry slam.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: A chance to shine in a community film festival sees Liam behind the camera trying to “direct” Sandra, who becomes a prima donna the second “Action!” is called. Unfortunately she's not very good actor, eventually causing her costar Raffi to quit. programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Seafood may not be your first thought when you think of a city like Detroit, Michigan, but at the Belgian-inspired Cadieux Cafe, Buddy tries the best bowl of steamed mussels and braised Belgian rabbit.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Dr. Lyndsey joins Dr. Lee to help David, who is fearful that the lump on his jaw might be cancerous. Carla has a mysterious, large bulge on her thigh that concerns Dr. Lee.

programme.title: Kidnapping In The Grand Canyon
programme.desc: When two best friends hiking the Grand Canyon trust an experienced hiking guide to bring them on an off-trail adventure, things go south when he takes them captive. They have to fight both man and nature.

programme.title: The Girl Who Wasn't Dead
programme.desc: This is the story of 15-year-old Erica who vanished without a trace. Authorities believed Erica may have been the victim of a local serial killer, but her mother, Carrie refused to believe the worst.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Chauncey and Derek team up with Project Manager. But with giant holes in the floor, roaches, and all sorts of unspeakable muck, the budget and timeline quickly balloon.

programme.title: Million Dollar Zombie Flips
programme.desc: James and his team partner with brother-sister newbie flippers Blake and Abby on a risky zombie house project. James funds the renovation, while the siblings manage the contractors and oversee the work.

programme.title: Earth Sweepers
programme.desc: After 11 hours by train, the Earth-Cleaning Bros learn they have 16 more hours to go — off-road! Bouncing and jolting toward a remote nomadic village, they eat, shop and finally reach their stay.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Impress your holiday guests with a classic cheesy fondue party! Rachael shows how to make her version of an easy and decadent "Fundue" that is sure to bring everyone around to celebrate the holidays.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Rachael shows how to prepare a meat-free holiday meal that everyone will love! First, she makes a flavourful soup using Italian pumpkins. Next, she prepares her family's traditional "Holiday Stars".

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Inspired by her friend Brian, Rachael shows how to make her version of a beef and chorizo chilli with queso that is the perfect meal for a holiday crowd, a big-match night or a family dinner.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Dining al-fresco hits new levels as host Michael Yo takes us on a tour of truly unique outdoor dining experiences - like noshing on Kampung-style food while seated in the middle of a river.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine

programme.desc: As winter descends on Oak Island and clues continue to be uncovered, the fellowship makes a final bold effort to find the treasure before operations cease for the winter.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In 1983, underdog company Tonka sets out to bring a game-changing toy from Japan to America: the transformable robot. But they're soon confronted by industry giant, Hasbro, who has its own competing line.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For centuries archaeologists have been obsessed with locating ancient cities lost to time. How does a once-thriving community become a lost city? And if they are found, what secrets they might reveal?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, many have claimed to be able to see into the future and changed the course of history. But what did their prophecies reveal? And what predictions did they make for the future?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the world's top ten pyramid sites, from a valley in Peru with over 250 hidden pyramids to an ancient Greek city with 4800-year-old ruins to Egypt's famous Giza Plateau.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, every major civilisation has believed in curses and their power to inflict harm. But if curses are real, then what brings them into existence? And how are they triggered?

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S5)
programme.desc: Over seven hundred years ago, a religious order protected a vast treasure of gold, precious gems, and relics... and then it all mysteriously vanished. What happened to the hoard of the Knights Templar?

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families

programme.title: Wooly Booly 2 (Ang Titser Kong Alien)
programme.desc: The sequel to the succesful Wooly Booly, Ang Classmate Kong Alien. The story continues with Wooly Booly living happily on earth with his human girlfriend. One day, his girlfriend from his planet decides to visit earth with the aim of taking Wooly Booly back home.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Bikini Watch (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: It's a wild and funny tale of action and romance as they encountered a mischievous group of hunks who were out to destroy the beach.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Basagulero
programme.desc: Berto Banal (Ronnie Ricketts) is a hoodlum with a conscience. He can't abide taking advantage of other poor people yet he has no qualms on robbing a usurer.

programme.title: Pieta 1
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Amanda (Charito Solis) and her unconditional love for her son Rigor (Ace Vergel). Rigor grows up not having to follow any rules and he does not cultivate a conscience. In his dealings with the underworld, he meets syndicate head Johnny Wilson. Will this pave the way for his all-out excursion to evil?

programme.title: Kool Ka Lang
programme.desc: This is the story of five girls living, loving and eventually fighting it out in the big city.

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Pandoy... Alalay Ng Panday
programme.desc: In Pandoy, Joey De Leon gave a comic twist to the popular "Panday," a fictional action hero popularized by the King himself, Fernando Poe, Jr.

programme.title: Mortal Kong Kaaway, Kaibigang Tunay
programme.desc: Lt. Eddie Ramirez (Roi Vinzon), is a dedicated cop. Raymond Martinez (Edu Manzano), an equally dedicated hoodlum. Two strong personalities both committed to their cause.

programme.title: Cross My Heart (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A strict old maid aunt and a widower, in search of a wife, were beginning to fall for each other but they refused to admit to the attraction.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Comic superstar Steve Carell takes on the role of Agent Maxwell Smart and Anne Hathaway steps into the shoes of sexy Agent 99 as the two superspies out to save the world from the nefarious forces of KAOS in this romp based on the classic television show created by Mel Brooks and Buck Henry.

programme.title: Smallville S2 5
programme.desc: Clark becomes concerned when a mysterious poet, Byron Moore (SEAN FARIS), leaves love notes for Lana at her parents' grave. Clark warns her to stay away from Byron, but she is intrigued.

programme.title: Smallville S2 6
programme.desc: Because the farm is in financial trouble, Martha asks her estranged father, William Clark (GEORGE COE), for help.

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guillermo del Toro (Pan's Labyrinth) brings out the big guns in this sci-fi action epic about a ragtag band of humans that band together in the year 2025 to fight legions of monstrous creatures rising from the sea. Using massive piloted robots to combat the alien threat, earth's survivors (including Charlie Hunnam, Charlie Day & Rinko Kikuchi) take the fight to the invading alien force lurking in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. Nearly defenseless in the face of the relentless enemy, the forces of mankind have no choice but to turn to two unlikely heroes -- a washed up former pilot and an untested trainee -- who now stand as earth's final hope against the mounting apocalypse.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc:
Behind every great love is a great story.
In Seabrook, South Carolina in the 1940s, teenaged debutante Allie Hamilton and local boy Noah Calhoun spend one passionate, carefree summer together and deeply in love. But when the summer ends, war and duty separate the young couple.
Today, an elderly man visits a nursing home to read from his notebook to a woman whose memory is fading. As he spins a tale of two young lovers with their whole lives before them, his beloved Allie relives a long-ago passion that has never died, an unbreakable bond between two ordinary people rendered extraordinary by the strength, power and beauty of true love.
Based on the novel by Nicholas Sparks, author of A Walk to Remember and Message in a Bottle.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 14
programme.desc: Outraged that he’s being forced to work with university nemesis, Barry Kripke, Sheldon faces a crisis of conscience. Howard and Raj spend a thousand dollars on action figures of themselves.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 15
programme.desc: A fight between Leonard and Sheldon drives Leonard to finally move in with Penny – not realizing how the shift will affect Penny and Amy’s living arrangements.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 16
programme.desc: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine’s Day, Raj and Stuart throw a lonely people party at the comic book store.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 17
programme.desc: After a terrible date, Raj vows to never leave his apartment again. Meanwhile, Penny actually impresses Sheldon with her acting skills.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 18
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard try to advance the cause of women in science by speaking with junior high girls about their future careers, while Raj plans his date with Lucy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 4
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q and Joe serve up the goods posing as trainees at a juice bar and plead with strangers to get things untangled. Plus, the big loser confronts his biggest fear in a punishment that leaves him practically catatonic.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 5
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q act frosty while working the ice cream counter, then take Joe's dogs for a romp in the park with help from some strangers. Later, the loser watches his blood boil while performing with a góspel choir.

programme.title: Smallville S1 6
programme.desc: Clark is wracked with haunting visions when he meets an old woman, Cassandra Carpenter (JACKIE BURROUGHS), who can see the future.

programme.title: Smallville S1 7
programme.desc: Clark must save Pete from being literally devoured by a female classmate, Jodi Melville, whose diet of Kryptonite-affected vegetables causes her to shed weight faster than she can handle.

programme.title: Smallville S1 8
programme.desc: Clark and Lex team up to rescue members of Clark's high school class after a janitor, Earl Jenkins (TONY TODD), takes them hostage in LuthorCorp's Smallville Fertilizer Plant No. 3.

programme.title: Smallville S1 9
programme.desc: Clark's secret identity is jeopardized when a corrupt policeman, Sam Phelan (CAMERON DYE), witnesses Clark using his superhuman powers and coerces him into joining forces.

programme.title: Smallville S1 10
programme.desc: A teenage girl, Amy Palmer, lets her obsession with Lex become life threatening as attacks in the Luthor mansion pit Clark against an invisible enemy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q and Joe climb the corporate ladder as TV execs pitching insane show ideas, and the big loser bares his soul while undergoing a humiliating psychic reading that puts his real life on the wrong track.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Sal, Murr, Q and Joe convince shoppers to repeat bizarre catch phrases, then go mental while psychoanalyzing strangers. Plus, it's an awkward drumroll for tonight's pair of losers when they're forced to perform at a halftime show.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 8
programme.desc: In one of the most unusual big money auctions yet, Sean auctions the contents of abandoned big-rigs. Scott and Jesse go head to head over a space age haul, while Brandon and Lori take a chance on a battle-ready rig. Meanwhile, Papa Bear goes all in for some vintage fun stuff - and he isn't in the mood to play games.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 9
programme.desc: It's wheels up for Papa Bear when he takes a gamble on a mysterious covered item. Meanwhile, the newcomer Alvarado brothers find an unusual collectible hiding in plain sight -- but are they going to flush their money down the toilet? And Brandon andLori find out whether a pet bin will turn out to be their best friend.

programme.title: Smallville S1 11
programme.desc: Clark is amazed when a pesticide magnate with enhanced powers of persuasion due to the meteor fragments convinces Jonathan to sell the family farm.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 3
programme.desc: Michael tests gravity when he floats the idea of astronaut snacks; his darkness-triggering popcorn is too newfangled for one movie goer; and he astonishes an antique store employee with glass figurines that feel emotion and repair themselves!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 4
programme.desc: Michael stumps a delivery man by pulling live crabs out of a Chinese food order and leaves a mother and daughter in disbelief by using a spinning bowl to extract peanuts from candy. Plus, he puts one man in a serious ethical dilemma.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (Season 14)
programme.desc: Danny and Baez join forces with Danny's old partner, Jackie Curatola (Jennifer Esposito), when a serial killer reappears.

programme.title: Get in the Dark
programme.desc: A reporter hears three horror stories when investigating a case of the paper doll spirit 20 years ago. Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.desc: Detective Maurice Stewart investigates the murder of a woman, who was allegedly gunned down by her neighbour after an argument over cats and dogs.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S3)
programme.desc: When police pull over a local man for violating his parole, the case takes a shocking turn when he suddenly confesses to multiple brutal murders.

programme.desc: When a witness sees a nightclub owner jump to his death from his fifth-floor condo, the case is seemingly open and shut; that is until Dr. Jennifer Nara's autopsy reveals shocking new evidence.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S3)
programme.desc: When police pull over a local man for violating his parole, the case takes a shocking turn when he suddenly confesses to multiple brutal murders.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Aaron Campbell didn't admit his crimes until after his conviction. He abducted six-year-old neighbour Alesha MacPhailand, carried her to a nearby wood, and raped and murdered her.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Tim and Barbara Pasa meet at a gig Tim is performing at and quickly fall for one another. Barbara is a surgical nurse by day, a fun-loving party animal. They marry quickly, shocking their friends.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S2)
programme.desc: Detective Maurice Stewart investigates the murder of a woman, who was allegedly gunned down by her neighbour after an argument over cats and dogs.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: An off-duty police officer shoots a man in the chest after a social event explodes into a deadly argument between the two men.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Year's Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Heartbreaking accounts of families torn apart by crime. Ashley Wallace, who was almost killed by her own mother, Jenny Carrieri, whose search for her sister's murderer consumed her life.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math

programme.title: Grade 2 English

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: Learn about parallel and perpendicular lines, angles, triangles, quadrilaterals, continuous and repeating patterns and number sentences, and the concept of time, perimeter, area, and volume.

programme.title: Grade 4 English

programme.desc: Unawain ang bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan sa lipunan, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng bansa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science

programme.desc: Learn the characterstics of plants and animals, what they need, and how they grow, as well as the physical properties and movement of objects. programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn the characterstics of plants and animals, what they need, and how they grow, as well as the physical properties and movement of objects. Know more about different types of weather and changes in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang mga salitang magkakatugma, salitang kilos, pang-ukol, at kung paano magsulat ng mga pangungusap nang may tamang baybay at laki ng mga letra.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about time and nonstandard units of length, mass, and capacity, as well as pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Romeo and Juliet are forced by their parents to see the therapist. Like any self-respecting teenagers, they love each other intensely and try to prove their love in rather extreme ways.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: Bolivia, a country shaped by the Royal Cordillera, also home to the Uyuni Salt Flat, the largest salt desert in the world, the high-altitude Lake Titicaca and the lush Amazon rainforest. While these breathtaking landscapes attract hundreds of thousands of travelers, Bolivia proves to be a harsh land for amateur hikers.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Aged 23, Valeriia Novikova left Russia to escape a restrictive society. She arrived in France thanks to an 'Au Pair' programme, decided to study languages and then did her 'coming out'. The young woman has created strong links with her host family and her community.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: With the Art Deco movement now over a century old we look back at the exhibition ''Art Deco France/North America'' at the Cite de l'Architecture et du Patrimoine. The story of woad. All the expertise of the Joseph Duclos Manufacture Royale recounted by Ramesh Nair. Wearing clothes with wide shoulders.

programme.title: Bijoux : Eclats De Reves
programme.desc: How do you design a piece of jewellery? Hear from creators, artisans and artistic directors from major houses.

programme.title: Envoye Special
programme.desc: In-depth reports, investigations, unseen interviews, detailed profiles, testimonies... The current affairs show that is always on the move, up close to events and all those involved!

programme.title: Objectif Monde
programme.desc: 'Objectif Monde'' proposes special reports and investigations into societal or geopolitical issues, taking the time to analyse the situations thanks to different specialist opinions. This TV5MONDE programme is produced with French-speaking partners (RTBF, RTS, Radio-Canada, France Televisions) and the support of the public French-speaking media.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Dans Les Bottes De Lucky Luke
programme.desc: Unlike many Hollywood films, the legend of Lucky Luke goes beyond an eternal face-off between cowboys and Indians. Mexican, Irish, Jewish, Italian, Chinese, Black and Cajun communities hold a special place in American history and the adventures of the lone cowboy.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver
programme.desc: Every year, the regulars flock to take part in the Inferno de Mürren ski race. Simon and the Suppenalp team are on deck. For their first season at the Hollandia mountain hut, Christina and Joel are finding their feet. In the Grisons, Nicola is relieved to see her partner again.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: A geopolitical and cartographic programme.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Fontainebleau, the Musee des Peintres de Barbizon traces the history of Impressionism. A self-taught chef turned Michelin-starred chef, Guy Martin looks back on his gastronomic career at the Grand Vefour. Time travel with Chemena Kamali, at the helm of Chloe. The art of straw marquetry with Stephanie Trolez.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 24
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 9
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.)

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 27
programme.desc: This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he vowed to seek revenge against the influential retired judge, Benito Balmores.
